originalText.text: Quick Ride drivers provide the best and safe services at a very reasonable price! Beats NYC taxi and Uber hands down - still $60 from LES to JFK üëçüëçüëçüëçüëç

originalText.text: I needed local service. Receptionist very nice. Car arrived in 10 minutes. Quiet driver. Pleasant drive. Comfortable car. I gave a $5 tip on a $10 fare. All good! Thank you Quick Ride!

text.text: I needed local service. Receptionist very nice. Car arrived in 10 minutes. Quiet driver. Pleasant drive. Comfortable car. I gave a $5 tip on a $10 fare. All good! Thank you Quick Ride!

originalText.text: Visiting from Florida we needed a ride back to the airport. The young lady told us it was a hour wait which was not a problem because we had a late flight. Driver showed up nice and might I add one of the cheapest services I had the whole 4 days I‚Äôve been here. 10/10. They will most definitely be my go to service next time I‚Äôm here.

originalText.text: Just took Quick Ride 5am to JFK from LES 10/16/2023.  Quick Ride is temporary not taking reservations. However, they will still pick up those that have reservations! Receptionist is on vacation!

text.text: Just took Quick Ride 5am to JFK from LES 10/16/2023.  Quick Ride is temporary not taking reservations. However, they will still pick up those that have reservations! Receptionist is on vacation!

originalText.text: I called ahead and booked the round trip from airport to Times Square hotel and back again.  Very nice staff, very dependable, and Very reasonable price, $50 where others were charging $100.  After being dropped off at the airport one of our 5 girls left her cell phone in the SUV, I called and they said they found it and would be back in 20 min and only charged $10.  That was well worth the money for the teenager who got her "lifeline" back.  I highly recommend them to everyone.
